game.name: NBA 2K25
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: NBA 2K25 플레이 시 궁극의 컨트롤을 할 수 있게 하는 ProPLAY™ 로 진정성과 리얼리즘으로 모든 코트를 제패하세요. MyCAREER, MyTEAM, MyNBA 및 The W에서 나만의 레거시를 정의하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Command every court with authenticity and realism Powered by ProPLAY™, giving you ultimate control over how you play in NBA 2K25. Define your legacy in MyCAREER, MyTEAM, MyNBA, and The W.
